rukus.text: 1|1|knongnam a l laoh mha sabborsa  mha anet sraleanh .
1|2|real kar sarsaer  ku champoh a l laoh del chea mcheasa krobkrong  piphp teangoasa .
1|3|chea mcheasa mha sabborsa  mha anet sraleanh .
1|4|chea se  d ch( krobkrong) nei thngai chomnoumchomreah( barlok) .
1|5|champoh trong temuoyokt del puok yeung korp sakkar haey  champoh trong temuoyokt del puok yeung som aoy chuoy .
1|6|saum trong me tda changaoulobangheanh dl puok yeung nouv meakra  da troem  trauv phng choh .
1|7|ku meakra  robsa banda anak del trong ban bratan nie k meat  dl puokke  poum men chea( meakra) anak del trauv ke khoengosambea  ning poummen  chea( meakra) puok del v nge  v ng laey .
